comments.name: The definition of the stream section
comments.provider: The stream provider that requires special handling.  The integrations that we have done include: yospace, dfp.  When provider is presented or its value is neither yospace nor dfp, no special logic would be needed
comments.source: Where the source endpoint comes from.  The possible values are: lioncms (from NeuLion CMS), dicecms (from Dice CMS), or external (the URL will be specified in the params section)
platforms: an array that lists supported platforms: the platform values can be: ios, android, tvos, androidtv, firetv.  The device should list the item only when the platform is applied

params.key: The params section contains the key value pairs used for specific provider, source and platform.  See the following examples that we are going to support for now.
